strings.Cmd_General_DontHavePermission: You don't have permission to execute this command!
strings.An error occurred when running the comma: An error occurred when running the command
strings.DontHavePermission_SendMessage: You do not have permission to send messages to text channel {0}!
strings.Cmd_setlanguage_Success: Server status message language set to `{0}`.
strings.Cmd_setindicator_Success: Server status indicator display set to `{0}`.
strings.Cmd_create_Success:
Sent server status message to text channel {0}. 
This message will be updated automatically from now on.
strings.Cmd_create_Old messages you previously s: Old messages you previously sent will no longer be updated.

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Displays the latency of this bot.

setlanguage.name: setlanguage
setlanguage.description: Set the display language for server status.

setindicator.name: setindicator
setindicator.description: Sets the display of the indicator that appears in the name of the text channel.

status.name: status
status.description: Send current server status. Server status sent with this command is not automatically updated.

create.name: create
create.description: Create server status messages that are automatically updated.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Text channel to send server status. If not specified, it will be created in the current channel.
